title: Farrukh condoles death of actor Sohail Asghar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 13 (APP): Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib expressed grief and sorrow over the demise of veteran actor Sohail Ashghar who breathed his last on Saturday after prolonged illness at Lahore.
In his condolence message, the minister said Asghar had performed on stage and television for a long time. His services to the showbiz industry would always be remembered.
He prayed to Allah Almighty to bless his soul with eternal peace and grant high ranks in Jannah.
